name: 楊詠荍
objective: This course is a special topics of Special topics of Processings of Ceramics.
schedule:
The course will cover the following topics:
Introduction to ceramic fabrication processes
Syntheses of ceramic materials
Surface chemistry of ceramic powders
Physical properties of ceramic powders
Introduction to the colloidal system
Dispersion principles of ceramic powders
Dispersion processes for ceramics
Dispersion characterization techniques
Additives for ceramic processes
Casting techniques of ceramic slurries
Online quiz
Online review
materials:
.J. Shaw, Introduction to colloid & surface chemistry, Butterworth-Heinemann, 1996.
－ E. Kissa, Dispersions: characterization, testing, and measurement, Marcel Dekker, 1999.
－ J.W. Goodwin, Colloidal Dispersions, Burlington House, 1982.
－ J.S. Reed, Introduction to the principles of ceramic processing, John Wiley & Sons, 1995.
－ T.A. Ring, Fundamentals of ceramic powder processing and synthesis, Academic Press, 1996.
